description: Frontend interface using Streamlit for the AI Troubleshooting Agent.

userStories.title: Chat Interface with Streaming
userStories.description: As a user, I want to type messages and see the agent's response stream in real-time, including internal thoughts.
acceptanceCriteria: Chat input field at the bottom
Display 'thought' events in expanders or distinct UI elements
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Configuration Management
userStories.description: As a user, I want to configure the agent settings without editing files.
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar or separate tab for settings
Dropdown to select Orchestrator Model (e.g., gpt-4, gpt-3.5)
Save button that updates the backend configuration
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Sub-Agent Visualization
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see which sub-agent is currently active.
acceptanceCriteria: Visual indicator of active agent in the chat stream
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
